                                                     FindRelatedConceptsRequestBuilder params)

        Description copied from interface: FindRelatedConceptsService

        Specified by:
        findRelatedConceptsWithReference in interface FindRelatedConceptsService
        Parameters:
        reference - An HP Haven OnDemand reference obtained from either the Expand Container or Store Object API. The contents of the object will be used as the query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of related concepts that match the query text
        Throws:
        HodErrorException
